entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
